su.whs.watl.ui

Class TextViewEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView
        • su.whs.watl.ui.TextViewWS
          • su.whs.watl.ui.TextViewEx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener, TextLayoutListener, ITextView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiColumnTextViewEx

    public class TextViewEx
extends TextViewWS
implements TextLayoutListener, ITextView
    TextViewEx - drop-in replacement for TextView additional features: - supports LineBreaker for line breaks - supports full justification for spanned strings - supports OverflowListener - supports two-tap click on urls - supports hyphenation (see sample application)

      • drawSelectionCursor

        protected void drawSelectionCursor(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                                   float x,
                                   float y,
                                   float lineHeight,
                                   boolean start)
        Description copied from class: TextViewWS
        called for painting selection cursor at starts and ends

        need inverse mode, if cursor out of clipRect ( inverse start horizontal inverse end horizontal inverse start vertical (if bottom line) inverse end vertical (if bottom line)

        Overrides:
        drawSelectionCursor in class TextViewWS
        Parameters:
        canvas - - canvas for paint
        x - - x coordinate of cursor
        y - - y coordinate of baseline of text (IMPORTANT)
        lineHeight - - height of line
        start - - if true, it is cursor for selection's starts, else - for ends
